thread.title: Arrieta, Cubs silence Pirates 4-0 to win NL wild-card game
thread.title_full: Arrieta, Cubs silence Pirates 4-0 to win NL wild-card game

title: Arrieta, Cubs silence Pirates 4-0 to win NL wild-card game
text:
> Pennsylvania Arrieta, Cubs silence Pirates 4-0 to win NL wild-card game Pittsburgh Pirates owner Bob Nutting, left, talks with Major League Baseball commissioner Rob Manfred in Pittsburgh before the National League wild card playoff baseball game between the Pirates and the Chicago Cubs, Wednesday, Oct. 7, 2015. (AP Photo/Gene Puskar) Search Help
